review: I'm still kind of amazed this little tiny thing does all the stuff it does.
author: BigBoss "bigboss"

review: My entire family loves this. Very easy set up
author: Kelly Daniels

review: I really like the Amazon Fire TV Stick.  I purchased two the first time and have already purchased another one so we have one for every TV.  It works well and is easy to use.  I would not spend the money for the voice activated one.  I did that the first time and cannot get the thing to work.  I have not sought customer support assistance though, so that is not to say it wouldn't work if I asked for help.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Amazon apps consistently crash, volume on Amazon video content is especially low leaving me to max out my volume on my TV just so that I can hear it thereby giving me less of a reason to continue my Prime membership after the trial.
author: Pen Name

review: Don't buy this. By the actual fire TV settop Way, way, better.  The stick simple put "blows". Locks up fully, sometimes audio freezes,etc... all requiring hard power cycling by pulling the usb cable. It's also sluggish in comparison to the fire TV settop.  I only paid $20 for mine but still feel ripped off.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy to set up and easy to use
author: Lois

review: This streaming box is pretty good. I feel that the apps are lacking, but otherwise it's a good deal.
author: J
